attributes.action: have less cctv cameras in cities and more in rural areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we want less cctv cameras in cities and towns because we feel like we are always being watched and that we need more privacy when going into town. although we think in rural areas there should be more cctv cameras, because thats where you lots burglaries and crimes because there is no - one around.
